definition: ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now
a moment ago/just now/(indicating sth happening later than expected)/(preceded by a clause of condition or reason) not until/(followed by a numerical clause) only

sentences.english: She's wasted in her present job.

definition: using a talented person in an insignificant position (idiom)/a sledgehammer to crack a nut
to cast pearls before swine (idiom)/not to get proper recognition for one's talents
to show respect for/to think highly of
with an undeserved reputation (idiom); unwarranted fame/nowhere near as good as he's made out to be
to force someone to do something
to lift sth up/to elevate sb/to honor sb (with compliments, gifts, promotions etc)/to show great regard/to speak highly/Taiwan pr. [tai2 ju3]
to bother/to press sb, usu. to do sth/it's a tough job/sorry to bother you (polite, used to thank sb for a favor)
a hero with no chance of using his might/to have no opportunity to display one's talents
pinyin: ying1 xiong2 wu2 yong4 wu3 zhi1 di4
